column4: i am having issues with flash and java, i sued the add/isntall application ( synaptic) to install all packages, one at a time, as they sdeemed to die of within a week. now though no flash is working can someone please assist me or point me to a interactive live help so i may get this issue resolved. this is important because it hinders my schoolwork, which is due by midnight tonight
